topic.title: Searching for Pizza Boy mod for Fallout New Vegas, and the Frontier hotfix that is earlier than 3.8
topic.body:
Hello. Really would appreciate help here.
First one, been searching for about a year now, can't find this amazing quest mod anywhere anymore.
Second is obvioulsy a recent thing. I know that Frontier started to get censored under the public pressure starting from hotfix 3.8. Therefore, searching for one that is earlier than that, ideally one that came straight before it. 

Thanks in advance for any help!
